testsuite.test:
Verify Preconditions
Instructions: 1) Make sure all the preconditions listed are met. They will be required by upcoming tests. 2) At least one contact must exist and the ID must be known (currently found '47'). 3) Click 'GO' to start testing.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

1 getAddressBookItem Get the one with ID 47
Instructions: 1) Make sure an address book item with the ID "47" exists. 2) Press 'GO'.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

getAddressBookItem Verify values
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Are the shown values as stored in your addressbook?

getAddressBookItem Verify returned AddressBookItem object
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

getAddressBookItemsCount Verify it returns a number
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

getAddressBookItemsCount Verify it returns the right number
Instructions: 1) Look up the number of contacts you have in your address book! 2) Click 'GO'.
Expected behaviour: Is this the number of contacts in your addressbook?

findAddressBookItems Search for fullName verify it returns an array
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

findAddressBookItems Search for fullName null verify it returns an array
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

findAddressBookItems Search for ab
Instructions: 1) Make sure a contact who's name starts with 'ab' is in your addressbook. 2) Click 'GO'.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

findAddressBookItems Search for ab
Instructions: 1) Make sure a contact who's name IS 'ab' is in your addressbook. 2) Click 'GO'.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

findAddressBookItems case insensitive search for ab AB
Instructions: 1) Make sure a contact who's name IS 'ab' is in your addressbook. 2) Click 'GO'.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

findAddressBookItems If either startInx endInx is negative throw exception
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

findAddressBookItems If startInx endInx return only one item
Instructions: 1) Make sure you have at least one address in your address book! 2) Click 'GO'.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

getAvailableAddressGroupNames verify its an array
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

createAddressBookGroup verify group is added
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

createAddressBookGroup throw INVALID PARAMETER
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

deleteAddressBookGroup
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

deleteAddressBookGroup throw INVALID PARAMETER
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

addAddressBookItem
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

addAddressBookItem Verify just added item
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

addAddressBookItem throw INVALID PARAMETER
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.
